title: How do you refund with this new UI?

replies.body:
Definitely can help you out with that!

After you open the store, look at the upper right hand corner and you'll see a small button with a picture of a person and a cogwheel on it.  Click that, and in the new window that appears, look at the far left side and select "Purchase" History" right under "Account".  Once there you should see the options to refund.

Hope this helps!  Let me know if you have any other questions!
Thank you very much my good sir!
